Sentencas: Syngas can be produced from H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis using an SOEC.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes

Sentencas: However, H-2 and CO are both produced in the cathode and the electricity consumption is large.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes

Sentencas: In this paper, direct carbon-assisted SOEC for H2O electrolysis (DC-SOFEC) is proposed for cogenerating electricity power and syngas with easy control of H-2/CO ratio.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes

Sentencas: A 2D numerical model is developed to study the effects of operating and design parameters on the DC-SOFEC performance.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes

Sentencas: The model is validated with experimental data for direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes

Sentencas: One important finding is that the carbon assisting is effective in lowering the equilibrium potential of SOEC, thus greatly reduces the electrical power consumption for H2O electrolysis.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes

Sentencas: The DC-SOFEC can generate electrical power, CO and H-2 simultaneously at a low current density and sufficiently high temperature.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes

Sentencas: Compared with conventional SOEC for H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis, DC-SOFEC is advantageous as CO and H-2 are produced in the anode and cathode, respectively.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes

Sentencas: This enables easy control of H-2/CO ratio, which is helpful for subsequent processes to synthesize other chemicals or fuels from syngas.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes

Sentencas: Besides, DC-SOFEC can actually produce electricity rather than consuming it.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes

Sentencas: The model can be used for subsequent design optimization of SOFEC for effective energy storage and conversion.
Titulo: Modeling of Direct Carbon-Assisted Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) for Syngas Production at Two Different Electrodes
